description: Add a hidden "Night Vision" mode that toggles a green-tinted, night-vision theme when the user types "night" anywhere on the site, with a subtle effect that keeps the calm aesthetic and persists across reloads.

userStories.title: Secret Trigger
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want a hidden trigger so that I can unlock a special mode without UI clutter.
acceptanceCriteria: Typing "night" anywhere toggles Night Vision mode on/off.
Typing "day" anywhere toggles Night Vision mode off.
A subtle toast or text cue confirms the toggle every time.
Verify in browser using agent-browser skill

userStories.title: Night Vision Theme
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want the theme to change so that the mode feels distinct.
acceptanceCriteria: Night Vision updates background, text, and accent colors to a green-tinted palette.
The theme remains readable and calm.
Verify in browser using agent-browser skill

acceptanceCriteria: Mode state is stored in localStorage.
